name: WAVES (itch) (BigHandInSky)
description:
My entry for the Global Game Jam 2017, the theme being WAVES.

Continuing with my tradition of not-really-doing-the-theme-but-kind-of, this did have a relation to waves, but lost it in the closing stages of the jam.

This is a Unity downloadable game, and supports WASD/Arrow Keys, and the Mouse.
